name: Lettering #012: Take a Break
description:
“Take a Break to Restore Flow”
I first stumbled into this quote back when I was in Architecture school in 2017-ish. I remembered how burnt out I was back then, and how a little break here and there, clinging back to neglected hobbies, or even just hanging out with friends, had such a positive impact to my flow
-
6 fps | 2000x2000px
20th of December 2020
Using Procreate App on iPad Pro
By Aysa Putri (@aysaptr)
